channel.title: EnsembleLearning on Memo Tut
channel.description: Recent content in EnsembleLearning on Memo Tut

item.title: Performance study of latest ensemble learning Sklearn Stacking (Compare LBGM, RGF, ET, RF, LR, KNN models with Heamy and Sklearn)
item.description: # TL;DR Stacking sklearn, it might be a standard because it was a very good child when I tried using it | library | layer1 | layer2 | public score | speed | | ————————– | ———————- ——- | ——- | ———— | —– | | lgbm model | lgb |-| 0.74162 |-| heamy single stacking | lbg, rgf, et, rf, lr, knn | lr | 0.76076 | 64s | heamy multiple stacking | lgb, rgf, et, rf, lr, knn | lgb, lr | 0.
